name: Feature proposal
about: Document a planned feature or behavior change
title: "[FEAT]"
labels: feature
assignees: ''

---
**Problem / motivation**
Why does this change need to happen? Summarize the user-facing gap, debt, or regression you want to address.

**Planned behavior / solution**
Describe the experience you intend to ship, including API changes, lifecycle notes, and observable behavior.

**Design notes, risks, and alternatives**
List the key implementation ideas, risky areas, trade-offs, and alternative approaches you considered.

**Testing and rollout**
How will you validate the change (unit, integration, benchmarks)? Note any migration steps or follow-up tasks.
